Job Title: Food Service Worker - Monticello

Location: Charlottesville, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Food Service Worker - Monticello

Requisition ID: 16034

Segment: Dining & Events

Brand: Constellation

Work Arrangement: Onsite

State: Virginia (US-VA)

The Role at a glance:

We are looking to add a motivated food service worker to our Dining & Events team in Charlottesville, VA. As a food service worker, you'll be at the heart of our food service operations, ensuring unforgettable experiences for our guests at Historic Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello Farm Table Café, Farm Shop and Jefferson Vineyards!

Background and Drug screening are required for this role.

What you'll be doing:

Preparing, serving and distributing food, and may require working in various areas of the department.

This list of duties and responsibilities is not all-inclusive and may be expanded to include other duties and responsibilities, as management may deem necessary from time to time.

What we're looking for:

Must-haves:

Must possess strong interpersonal and customer skills. Have excellent attention to details and service knowledge. Have excellent communication and organization skills. 

Nice-to-haves:

Prior food service experience is preferred. 

What's in it for you:

Weekly Pay, Flexible Schedule, Referral Program, Growth Opportunities & more!

#indeedelior #JC #monster

About Constellation:

From retail spaces to office buildings, Constellation provides high-quality business dining and catering experiences all over the United States. Constellation takes pride in building every meal around its goal of fostering connections through food and hospitality.

About Elior North America:

Elior North America is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. We are committed to diversity and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and abilities. We take pride in supporting the development of our employees and their skills at all levels and in fostering an environment of growth.

At Elior North America, we are committed to offering growth and advancement opportunities for all of our employees. The valuable skills and experience you’ve gained with Elior will propel you further in your career, whether with our corporate office or one of our brand segments.

Disclaimer: This job description can be revised by management as needed.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
